dragonsurvival.advancement.aether/be_old: Gain level 60 growth as a aether dragon.
dragon_ability.dragonsurvival.behuman.de:
■ When the Aether Dragon reaches the Ancient stage, it can transform into a human form.

■ §cNote: The current version has model issues, third-person view is recommended!§r
dragon_ability.dragonsurvival.become_big:
■ Upgrading this ability §2enlarges§r§7 your size.

■ Also §2increases§r§7 entity and block interaction range.§r
dragon_ability.dragonsurvival.become_sma:
■ Upgrading this ability §2shrinks§r§7 your size.

■ Also §2decreases§r§7 entity and block interaction range.§r
dragon_ability.dragonsurvival.wind_breat:
■ The Aether Dragon exhales a gentle breeze, as if breathing clouds and mist.

■ The wind can §2clear weeds§7 and also §2grant speed§7 to allies.§r

■ Its §2damage is low§7, but it §2does not consume mana§7.§r
dragon_species.dragonsurvival.aether_dra:
§7■ The §6Aether Dragon§r§7 is a §fswift§r§7, §fagile§r§7, and graceful creature, its body cutting through §fseas of clouds and waves§r§7.

§2■ Traits:§f§r§7 High mobility, weather and airflow magic, underwater breathing boost, fall immunity.
§4■ Weakness:§r§7 Deep underground.
§6■ Diet:§f§r§7 Animal products.§r

§7■ The §6Qing Dragon§r§7 is the human form after the Aether Dragon transforms.§r§7

§2■ Traits:§f§r§7 High mobility, weather and airflow magic, underwater breathing boost, fall immunity.
§4■ Weakness:§r§7 Deep underground.
§6■ Diet:§f§r§7 Animal products.§r
dragon_body.dragonsurvival.aether_body_h:
§6■ Human body§r
§7■ Qing dragons are the true air benders: the streamlined body allows for greater speed on land, water and mid-air. They §fuse less hunger§r§7 during flight, §frun faster§r§7 and §fjump higher§r§7. In turn, aether dragons are more vulnerable in combat, lacking in physical strength, health and protection.

item.kubejs.tundra_dragon_heart.tooltip: §6■ Remnant of the Tundra Dragon Progenitor, containing the essence of ice.
item.kubejs.aether_dragon_heart.tooltip: §6■ Remnant of the Aether Dragon Progenitor, containing the essence of wind.
item.kubejs.astral_dragon_heart.tooltip: §6■ Remnant of the Astral Dragon Progenitor, containing the essence of stars.
